derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French intermédiaire, from Italian intermediario, from Latin intermedius (see intermediate)

entry.def: An intermediary is a person who passes messages or proposals between two people or groups.

example.ex: She wanted him to act as an intermediary in the dispute with Moscow.
example.tran: 她想让他充当中间人来调解与莫斯科的争端。

means.word_mean: 1. a negotiator who acts as a link between parties
